Class ZkQConsumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ZkQConsumer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher, QConsumer

    public class ZkQConsumer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, QConsumer, org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher
    Created by prayag on 11/18/15. Distributed Queue consumer. Meant to be run in a thread.

      • ZkQConsumer

        public ZkQConsumer(org.apache.zookeeper.ZooKeeper zk,
           java.lang.String qRoot)
        Constructor for the consumer
        Parameters:
        zk - ZooKeeper instance to use
        qRoot - The root dir of the queue on ZooKeeper. All messages will be stored under the root.

    • Method Detail

      • startConsuming

        public void startConsuming()
                    throws org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException,
                           java.lang.InterruptedException
        Start the consuming process. Walks through all messages and consumes them. Waits for producer to produce more messages if runs out of messages to consume.
        Specified by:
        startConsuming in interface QConsumer
        Throws:
